headline: Masco (MAS) Q3 Earnings: Taking a Look at Key Metrics Versus Estimates
summary: Although the revenue and EPS for Masco (MAS) give a sense of how its business performed in the quarter ended September 2025, it might be worth considering how some key metrics compare with Wall Street estimates and the year-ago numbers.

headline: Masco (MAS) Q3 Earnings and Revenues Lag Estimates
summary: Masco (MAS) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of -4.90% and -1.10%, respectively, for the quarter ended September 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Masco (MAS) Q3 Earnings and Revenues Lag Estimates

headline: Masco (NYSE:MAS) Reports Sales Below Analyst Estimates In Q3 Earnings
summary: Home-building design and manufacturing company Masco Corporation (NYSE:MAS) missed Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q3 CY2025, with sales falling 3.3% year on year to $1.92 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.97 per share was 5.7% below analysts’ consensus estimates.

raw.headline: Masco (NYSE:MAS) Reports Sales Below Analyst Estimates In Q3 Earnings
raw.summary: Home-building design and manufacturing company Masco Corporation (NYSE:MAS) missed Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q3 CY2025, with sales falling 3.3% year on year to $1.92 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.97 per share was 5.7% below analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Masco: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: MAS) on Wednesday reported third-quarter net income of $189 million. On a per-share basis, the Livonia, Michigan-based company said it had net income of 90 cents. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring costs, were 97 cents per share.

raw.headline: Masco: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: MAS) on Wednesday reported third-quarter net income of $189 million. On a per-share basis, the Livonia, Michigan-based company said it had net income of 90 cents. Earnings, adjusted for non-recurring costs, were 97 cents per share.

headline: Masco Corporation Reports Third Quarter 2025 Results
summary: LIVONIA, Mich., October 29, 2025--Masco Corporation (NYSE: MAS), one of the world’s leading manufacturers of branded home improvement and building products, reported its third quarter 2025 results.
